What Is Ecoâ€‘Friendly Copier Rental?

Ecoâ€‘Friendly Copier Rental refers to leasing copier machines that are optimized for sustainability. These copiers typically feature:

1. Reduce Paper Waste and Optimize Printing

The most obvious way to be eco-friendly is using less paper. Here are simple strategies that complement green copiers:

  • Enable duplex printing by default

  • Set conservative margins and fonts

  • Review documents digitally before printing

Proper maintenance not only extends the life of your copier but also maintains peak energy efficiency:

Modern ecoâ€‘friendly copiers incorporate innovative features like:

  • Instant-on power systems
